PROJECT.NAME: iqSphRube1-mito
PROJECT.TITLE: Sphingonotus rubescens, mitochondrial assembly, iqSphRube1-mito.
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project collects the mitochondrial assembly of Sphingonotus rubescens. The assembly is provided by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) via the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/).

PROJECT.NAME: iqSphRube1
PROJECT.TITLE: Sphingonotus rubescens, genome assembly, iqSphRube1, alternate haplotype.
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project provides the genome assembly of Sphingonotus rubescens. The assembly is provided by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) via the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/).
